profileAlternative.name: Tim Balderston
profileAlternative.headline: Targeting Senior Database Administrator Role with Oracle and/or MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary: Highly-focused, Oracle Database Administrator with over twenty years of experience in design, installation, configuration, administration, tuning and management of database solutions with an emphasis on strong problem-solving and teaming skills. Industries include: Distribution, Insurance, Manufacturing, and Software Development.
